div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 229 Copais, Boeotia, 1908 (262) Burial: after 176 B.C. Contents: 1549 AE Perseus: 1 Boeotia: 50 (as BMC pl. 6, 2) 1497 (as BMC pl. 6, 8; over Anti- gonus Doson) Carystus: 1 Disposition: Athens Svoronos, JIAN 1908, pp. 230-2; 1911, p. 64
